title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies via Virtual Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (operations, equations, functions)
context.additional_context: Recreating mathematical problems from real-world work environments through virtual simulations to emphasize collaborative problem-solving competencies

learning_goals: Learners can accurately analyze given mathematical problem scenarios at least three times in a virtual simulation environment.
Learners can propose at least two simulation-based mathematical problem-solving strategies through collaborative problem-solving with team members.
Learners can visually represent and interpret simulation results in a constrained technical environment (smartphone).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
